body.name: Caboo Tree Free Bamboo Paper Napkins, 4 Packs of 250, 1000 Total Napkins, Eco Friendly, Sustainable, and Disposable Kitchen Napkins
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 13 hrs
features: TREE FREE, ECO-FRIENDLY paper napkins made from sustainably grown bamboo, which grow significantly faster than traditional tree based white kitchen napkins, giving you a sustainable, green alternative
EARTH FRIENDLY CHOICE FOR RV, CAMPING, BOATS, picnics, travel, backpacking, or everyday lunch and dinners
SOFT & STRONG 1 PLY SHEETS – the perfect combination of bamboo's strength yet soft fibers that produce a napkin that's strong, durable, and absorbent
HYPOALLERGENIC, BPA FREE, LINT FREE, & FRAGRANCE FREE, using an elemental chlorine free bleaching process, giving you full honest transparency and unmatched excellence

BULK PACK OF FOUR (4) packs of 250 Sheets for a total of 1,000 square napkins. Caboo's manufacturing facility is accredited by BRC, FSC, FDA and ISO certifications. We are proudly "Panda Friendly" by sourcing bamboo which is not a food source for panda bears.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SOFT + STRONG Bamboo's natural grass fibers produce a strong paper that is still soft for you and your Caboo! Our 1-ply paper is sturdy and soft for an impeccable clean. UNSCENTED Our dinner napkins dissolve quickly and naturally, and have no added fragrance so your guests can enjoy dinner parties, camping trips, BBQs and more. BREAKS DOWN NATURALLY Bamboo fibers break down in an average of 4-6 months. It's easy to see why Caboo is a smart choice when you compare that to the years of time it takes for tree paper to break down fully. BPA FREE BPA is chemical compound used in manufacturing that has been linked to adverse side effects in humans. We are proud to produce BPA free paper towels for you and your family.

Choosing Caboo saves trees and replants them, too. Working with the U.S. Forest service, we plant a tree for every pound of paper sold. More trees means better air, water, habitat and chance to combat climate change. We believe most people want to do better by the Earth. But where to start? We started Caboo: two brothers, a wife and a friend. Wiping out forests along with a spill or a bum just didn't make sense to us. So we figured it out, building relationships with trusted farmers, retailers and folks along the way. Ten years and two kids later, we're even more committed to making tree-free the go-to. Daily decisions like choosing Caboo do make a difference. We and the forest thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the office or daily use
reviews.reviewText: These are thin and are not ones I'd use to entertain guests with if having a fancy party but for everyday office and home use or picnics these are great. The size is excellent. They are thin and suitable for packing in lunch boxes, etc. I am thrilled that they are a more environmentally friendly option. They were nicely packaged, and the plastic they are packaged in is also recycled. They were delivered quickly. They wouldn't be highly absorbent - they are not thick like paper towels. They are actually a bit softer than I expected, and I am happy with the quality and will order them again in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actually really study despite thin
reviews.reviewText: They're not soft, they're thin. And they're sturdy and they do their job and i'm actually quite pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The pack includes a generous amount of 1000 napkins, which was great for our family's everyday use. The napkins are sturdy and do not tear easily, even with heavier use. If you’re looking for plastic free, these are unfortunately wrapped in plastic.One downside I noticed is that the napkins have a slight texture to them, which may not be suitable for all occasions. Additionally, they may not be the most cost-effective option for frequent use, but the eco-friendly benefits may outweigh the cost.Overall, I would recommend these eco-friendly bamboo paper napkins to anyone looking for a sustainable and sturdy option for their kitchen. They are a great alternative to traditional paper napkins and a step towards a more sustainable lifestyle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent napkins, decent price
reviews.reviewText: These napkins are just enough absorbancy and thickness for the price. Bonus on the no trees part! Buying them in bulk on Subscribe n Save is the way to go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: good product good finish good use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thinner than I’d hoped
reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s made of bamboo, and fairly ecologically responsible. I think that the number of napkins for the money is a good value; but I also think that they’re too thin. We’ll use them of course, and they’re okay for informal dinners though it may take more than one sometimes to get through the meal, so when it’s time to reorder, I’ll continue my search for a thicker, single ply, ecologically responsible napkin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful for many things, soft enough to use as tissue.
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this product its flexibility and its use of bamboo instead of pulpwood. I would like to see a more affordable bamboo paper towel product'

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am into using organic and eco-friendly products whenever possible, so i was excited to try these bamboo napkins. I can truly say i do not regret my purchase these napkins are durable and absorbent and just as good as mainstream brands. I just ordered them for the third time and will continue to order them as our new napkin brand.
